description:
Vovsoft VCF Merger is an easy-to-use utility that lets you combine multiple vCard (.vcf) files into a single contact file, with no internet connection required — your data stays entirely on your computer.

Vovsoft VCF Merger is an easy-to-use utility that lets you combine multiple vCard (.vcf) files into a single contact file, with no internet connection required — your data stays entirely on your computer.

Whether you have individual contact files exported from Outlook, iCloud, Android, Gmail, or other sources, this tool can merge them into one consolidated .vcf file while preserving all contact fields, such as name, phone number, email address, company, website, and more.

It supports vCard versions 2.1, 3.0, and 4.0, and works with both single-contact VCF files or multi-contact files using batch processing. All formatting and structure are fully retained.

Your contacts never leave your device. Vovsoft VCF Merger is a standalone desktop application that runs offline — no data upload, no background syncing, no risk of data leaks.

Key Features:
* Merge multiple VCF files into one .vcf file
* Supports vCard 2.1 / 3.0 / 4.0 formats
* Preserves all fields: name, phone, email, address, notes, photo, etc.
* Batch mode: Combine many VCFs in one go
* Ideal for use with Android phones, iPhones, Outlook, Gmail, iCloud
* Fast, lightweight, and user-friendly
